website_summaries.verdict: While this model is more like a sleeper love seat than sofa, it is worth considering if a smaller model would fit your needs and living space.
pros: Great for tight spaces, as it boasts a loveseat design that folds out into a smaller sleeper
Mattress is made of memory foam that's comfortable and supportive
Minor assembly can be completed easily without tools
cons: It won't fit two adults comfortably

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright. Not very comfortable and the back is really short so you feel like you’re sitting on a child’s sofa. It was easy to put together but two of the feet wouldn’t screw in so they pop off when you move it around. A little gorilla glue helped with that. It’s ideal for a studio or guest room but does not look right in a full size living room. Bought it for the pullout bed so for that purpose it will work. Beware it’s stupid heavy so have help unboxing and moving or you might be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon George

customer_reviews.title: shoddy craftsmanship,  uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The sofa is a small space sleeper. The foam is scant and so sleeping on it is uncomfortable. That and the shoddy craftsmanship prompted me to contact the company to work with me on a solution. I had received it in time for holiday company, but could not exchange it before it was needed. And there was no offer of expedited exchange, just return or keep it , basically. NO helpful response. No phone call or personal outreach. Seemed unlike Wayfair, to be sure! Certainly a shame for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: A Love seat, that can't be beat
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect being used in a computer room, which is small. Great for when guest come and stay overnight.
customer_reviews.author: joseph j.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Sleeper Sofa
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pull-out sofa for my home office. Doesn’t take up much space. Foam mattress is quite comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: AZTROGRS

customer_reviews.title: A reasonable price for a nice sleeper sofa especially in a limited space.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in my office to use for two to watch TV and as a guest room for one person to sleep on sofa sleeper bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent sofa sleeper. Not very comfortable but strong and sturdy. Surprisingly well built. Note: This sofa is an exclusive to Wal Mart. Every single sofa 'purchased' from Amazon is a reseller who will just mark it up and order it from Wal Mart.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Z

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeper couch
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. The gray is really pretty,and the cushions are very comfortable.i received my order about a week early which I appreciated since I have company from out of town that will be sleeping on it. What I’m upset about is I got no notice my couch was arriving today.the fed ex driver didn’t ring our bell,the only way I knew it was there is our “ring” went off. He didn’t know we were home.. I could not have lifted this huge box he just left out in the open if my granddaughter wasn’t there. I would have appreciated a notice either from Amazon,or the company I purchased from
customer_reviews.author: Kathy carter

customer_reviews.title: Hole in back of couch
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t try it ... hole in back .... not acceptable. Want refund!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda C. White

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable and small
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a child’s room as a hideaway sleep over bed. Cushions are not comfortable at all. It cost way too much to return so I’m stuck so I’ll need to replace the padding for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: cbcb

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality For The Price
customer_reviews.text: We like the way it looks, and the bed is comfortable to sleep on. It’s not cozy to sit on, but it’s ok. And it is the right size for the space we have. For the price the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Lana L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little sleeper sofa!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how anyone could have anything bad to say about this perfect little sleeper sofa. The cushions are firm and is comfortable to sit on. The pull out twin is also comfortable. My 16 year old volunteered to test it the first night here and loved it. I love it. So happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T.

customer_reviews.title: Firm and fits right in!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this sofa for months and it was extremely easy to assemble and fits right in my studio apartment. Very firm and great for when guests come over and they always compliment my little couch. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rahimah T. Ali Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Love this couch. The pull out bed is comfortable and it’s the perfect size for my husband’s man cave
customer_reviews.author: Amira

customer_reviews.title: Great addition in any room.
customer_reviews.text: So far so GREAT! It’s a better quality than I hoped for. It’s easy to assemble and use. It’s short in length and height do it’s perfect for my mom’s room when I have to sit with her.
customer_reviews.author: Frosty

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great for a spare bed. It is a little short for an adult to sleep on tho. Have to lay diagonally. But it is very comfy bed otherwise. Love seat is nice too. Soft. Easy to assemble. Easy to move around too.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Small Space Beauty
customer_reviews.text: I just got this sofa yesterday, but I was very pleased as I unpacked it. It fits in my small room perfectly. All we had to do after unpacking it was screw the feet on it, and it was ready to move into my space. It sits very comfortably, and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Cavinder

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: This item is really more sized for children, not adults. I am average sized and it is far too small for me to sit on comfortably. It fits my 11 year old son, but the cushions are very hard and uncomfortable. I would not recommend this. It was not good use of my $400. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: hockey4ever

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking couch bed
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice couch... It’s very firm. Perfect for an additional bed when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Da Barts

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than expected.
customer_reviews.text: For the most part fully assembled. Arrived on time. Makes a cute sitting area that doubles as a guest bed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda G

customer_reviews.title: Sofa firm to sit on, her is comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The sofa is very firm, but the sleeper is very comfortable. That was the reason I bought this sleeper sofa, so I could have a place for my guest to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Memory foam mattress is on the thin side, works well for the smaller sized humans in our family.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin p rushton

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size I deal for overnight guest.
customer_reviews.text: This sofa is firm And comfortable to sit on however bed mattress is a bit soft to sleep on nightly
customer_reviews.author: DJ Servay

customer_reviews.title: I got what I expected
customer_reviews.text: the value is spot on. It looks great for any decor and the seller was very cooperative and quickly responded to my emails reassuring me of the delivery. I appreciated all their help with this order.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Keaton

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable to both sit on and sleep on. It was easy to assemble and fit perfectly in our small den.
customer_reviews.author: Joan E. Gismond

customer_reviews.title: Bueno
customer_reviews.text: Smaller/shorter than I thought it would be, but its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: BSquare

customer_reviews.title: The Little Sleeper That Even Teenagers Like
customer_reviews.text: I like this sofa. There really isn't any assembly. Just put the pillows on the base. The sofa is well made, there's some heft to it. It took 3 of us to move it up stairs. 2 could do it, but I'm OCD. It's a true pull out & a sheet set will suffice. The grandestkids like it left out for movies. They're loungers and it passes all their wants & needs. And that's important.
customer_reviews.author: Aukele

customer_reviews.title: Quickly sets up for even grown sons
customer_reviews.text: Terrificly comfortable sleeper for a small space. Super simple to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: In my den which is small. So product fit fine, it's sturdy and looks nice. I only have a problem with the cushions for your back, will add more stuffing in cushions. And I can't figure out what the velcro on the top of the back is for.
customer_reviews.author: pamela wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Walmart sofa
customer_reviews.text: Great sofa but don't buy it here. This is a third party seller who buys the sofa from Wal-Mart and charges you more for it. Buy directly from Wal-Mart.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking loveseat.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great in my small piano room but I thought the fold out bed would be a little wider. My mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Tyler

product_meta.title: Mainstay Sofa Sleeper with Memory Foam Mattress | No-Tool Easy Assembly (Grey)
product_meta.description: Color:GreyThe Mainstays Loveseat Sleeper with Memory Foam Mattress is the perfect secondary sleeping solution. This loveseat sleeper features no-tool easy assembly, a plywood frame construction for lasting stability and dark espresso finished faux wood legs. Easy operating sofa bed mechanism converts from sofa to bed quickly. Upholstered in a durable woven grey polyester fabric, this sofa sleeper offers the best comfort for secondary sleeping in your family room, casual living rooms or guest rooms.
feature_bullets: Pocketed Coil Seating, No-Tool Easy Assembly , Upholstery Grade Woven Polyester Fabric
Cleaning Instructions: Spot Clean , Plywood Frame Construction, Black Plastic Legs
Twin Memory Foam Sleeper Mattress, Assembled Dimensions: 57.1 in L x 30.3 in W 33.9 in H x 125 lbs, Seat Dimensions: 45.2 in W x 19.3 in D x 17.7 in H
Depth of loveseat when sleeper is out: 83.8 in, Leg Height: 2.6 in H, Dimensions of Bed: 73.6 in L x 37 in W x 18.5 in H
Weight Capacity of Sofa: 500 lbs, Weight Capacity of Bed: 350 lbs,

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars94 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
